question:
Which of the following is/are the characteristics of an ecotone?
1. Ecotone may be very narrow or quite wide.
2. It is a a zone of tension as it has the conditions intermediate to the adjacent ecosystems.
3. An ecotone which is well developed may contain some organisms which are entirely different from that of the adjoining communities.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Ecotone may be very narrow or quite wide. It is a a zone of tension as it has the conditions intermediate to the adjacent ecosystems. An ecotone which is well developed may contain some organisms which are entirely different from that of the adjoining communities.
